name: Cursed Harvest
description:
You have inherited your grandmothers garden, and the soil is imbued with powerful magic. Plants grown in this soil are extremely valuable but can be quite difficult: plants often will uproot themselves and walk around creating chaos, attacking other plants and harming your garden. Keep your magical garden weeded and lift yourself out of your debt to the evil queen.

  • 3D Farming Game 
  • Fast Paced Gameplay 
  • 3 Different types of crops 

CONTROLS :
